channel.title: One SIngle question
channel.description: Why are all the private servers takin off the item spawning, and all the other neat commands off their servers, just ot make it exactly like runescape? I mean wats the point of trying to duplicate every single part of runescape while u could just play runescape? i thought private servers were to be a version of runescape where u could get ur self items ude never be able to get on runescape, and skills ude never be able to get on runescape. not the other way around.

item.title: One SIngle question
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:

I want to get a working economy up and running, so I’m not going to allow people to have any item they want, or be any level for that reason.

Read full topic

well, thats the good thing about open source, you can make it how you want it

item.title: One SIngle question
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

well infact post private server most is too be close too runescape working ingame economy and such… my server isnt running any commands for just anyone because people go crazy and crash it so only mods/ admins can create items until i can find a fool proof way for item creation… does that make me unfair no im simply just not gonna have 30,000 phats but it wont be like runescape either probly silabscape version 5 is gonna get a fresh start with stats and you will be able too choose 2 skills you want 99 in and 1 attack type but for now current goals is quests and some other little goodies

Read full topic

item.title: One SIngle question
item.dc:creator: @daiki daiki
item.description:
@daiki wrote:

Yup. And to safely test client hacks or other scripts.

Talking about private servers going unfair… I have even seen some servers where the “staff” trade private server gold for real RuneScape gold! How wrong is that?

Read full topic
